analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#590-604):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#603-604)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#604)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#391-490):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#405-414)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#418-421)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#461-462)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#458-460)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#391-490):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#405-414)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#418-421)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#462-467)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#463-467)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParicipantWhitelist(msg.sender,this,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#485-486)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- time > crowdsale.startsAt() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#751-752)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#337-381):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#357-359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#371-374)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#380-381)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#381)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#378-380)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#360)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#368)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#391-490):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#405-414)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#418-421)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#451-453)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#450)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#455-458)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#505-524):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#508-512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#516-517)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#517-518)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#514-515)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#514)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#832-860) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#853-860)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#850-860)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#221-223)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#11-12)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#204-205)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe40ff9509e9e82e4f643e472513f6416c7183f67.sol#205)
